mapper.update: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS ${db}.service ( id INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255), protocol VARCHAR(20), src_start_port INT(10), src_end_port INT(10), dst_start_port INT(10), dst_end_port INT(10), group VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (id), UNIQUE KEY IDX_NAME(name), KEY IDX_GROUP(group)) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=0 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4;
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM ${db}.service WHERE name = #{service.name} LIMIT 1;
